room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Guild" by The Ruse Escape Rooms in Grand Rapids
room_address: 25 Division Avenue S Grand Rapids, MI 49503
room_description:
For centuries, an underground society - known only as the Guild - has been the source of the greatest inventions of mankind. The Guild members vow to use their minds for the common good, but a rogue inventor has created something too powerful and dangerous for human hands. The Guild has hired you to stop him... but can you stop him in time?
There are two identical rooms available at the location. You can book them with 6-16 players and race against each other (and the clock).
